message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a one-time opportunity. I think you'll really love it!
I appreciate the offer, Alice, but $14,000 is a bit steep for me.  I'm willing to pay $12,000 for this product.  What do you think?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I can see you really want this product, and I'm willing to meet you in the middle. How about we discuss $13,500?
